name: Chump Genius Card Game App
blurb: A Science, Math, History and Reading Adventure Game App for Kids' Brains

rewards.reward: Start seeing Chump Genius! Cover you or your favorite kid\u2019s small screens with a wallpaper pack for the iPhone, iPad or desktop. Your name will be added to our prestigious Chump Genius THX page.
Receive a message from somewhere in time, containing a Chump Genius all-access code that lets you play the game app for FREE. Also includes wallpaper pack and name on Chump Genius THX page.

Get a peg leg up on game play with a FREE Chump Genius Bonus Relic. Keep it in your junk drawer, you\u2019ll know when to use it\u2014you\u2019re a genius! Also includes all-access code, wallpaper pack and name on Chump Genius THX page.

The pledge that pays! Get an extra 25 smart points to enhance your game play. Use yours to get out of a jam or to make friends feel inferior with your impressive smart points total. Of course this pledge also includes all-access code, bonus relic, wallpaper pack and name on Chump Genius THX page

Show us your genius! Submit a factoid we will use in the game app and see your smarts in play. Tell friends \u201cthat one\u2019s mine.\u201d If they don\u2019t believe you it\u2019s only because they don\u2019t understand your genius. Plus, get all that came before: all-access code, bonus relic, 25 free smart points, wallpaper pack and name on Chump Genius THX page.

Got a friend who\u2019s almost as smart as you? Here\u2019s an extra all-access code to lay on them. It feels better when someone else understands your Chump Genius. Pledge includes your all-access code, bonus relic, 25 free smart points, wallpaper pack and name on Chump Genius THX page\u2014and the option to submit a factoid.

EXCLUSIVE! LIMITED TO THE FIRST 10 PLEDGES (pretend these words are flashing brightly)\r\nGet a digital, comic book portrait of you or your favorite Chump Genius\u2019 face by our talented artiste Ricardo Osnaya. Hang it over your mantel, on the fridge or send it to grandma. \r\nThis exclusive level also includes two all-access codes, bonus relic, 25 free smart points, wallpaper pack and name on Chump Genius THX page\u2014and the option to submit a factoid.

Chump Genius draws you in! LIMITED TO THE FIRST FIVE $100 PLEDGES!\r\nHave your comic book likeness to drawn in to the Chump Genius comic pages. \r\nNot one of the first lucky five? Every $100 Pledge still receives a Chump Genius Rules limited edition t-shirt that features our logo and one of the 32 rules you must learn to excel at Chump Genius. And you get all that you see listed here: two all-access codes, bonus relic, 25 free smart points, wallpaper pack and name on Chump Genius THX page\u2014and the option to submit a factoid.

Did someone say easter eggs? For $200 only you (and everybody else with deep Chump Genius pockets) will know where and how to hunt for this in-game gaga. And because you gave $200, we\u2019ll give you 2 Chump Genius Rules limited-edition t-shirts signed by the real Drake and Dominick. Oh, and of course this includes: two all-access codes, bonus relic, 25 free smart points, wallpaper pack and name on Chump Genius THX page\u2014and the option to submit a factoid.

Whoa! Where\u2019d you get $500? Not that we\u2019re complaining. Your magnanimous generosity will get you a signed, original Chump Genius comic book, penciled page by our artiste, Ricardo Osnaya (limited to first 10 $500 pledges).\r\nPLUS! all of this swag: two all-access codes, two signed Chump Genius Rules t-shirts, easter eggs, bonus relic, 25 free smart points, wallpaper pack and name on Chump Genius THX page\u2014and the option to submit a factoid.

Work with the artistes! You are cordially invited to Skype with our artists and help design a Chump Genius Story Card. Throw ideas around, make fun of each other, somebody run for coffee, ignore the people in front of you and text a friend\u2014it\u2019s just like a real life meeting.\r\nAnd, get all the great stuff: two all-access codes, two Chump Genius Rules t-shirts, easter eggs, bonus relic, 25 free smart points, wallpaper pack and name on Chump Genius THX page\u2014and the option to submit a factoid.

What does every Chump Genius secretly want out of life? To discover the God particle (oops, too late). How about have a junkyard named after you? That\u2019s right ONLY 1 lucky genius can attain this level of notoriety. See your name forever above all the junk in the Chump Genius comic book, all editions.\r\nPlus get all this other Chump Genius junk: two all-access codes, two, signed Chump Genius Rules t-shirts, easter egg, bonus relic, 25 free smart points, wallpaper pack and name on Chump Genius THX page\u2014and the option to submit a factoid.
